name: DumpsterDive
description:
Rough prototype currently only for OSX. I'm  aiming to have weekly stage builds up until I feel comfortable charging for the game; which will correlate with completeness and playability.

Choose from an array of trash-golem characters to explore the dirty underworld of Chemical Evolution LLC. 

Space to jump

T for the main menu

G for the secret menu

L to toggle character lights

Some characters sprint with Shift and have multiple forms with 1,2,3,4
